name: Ro tel with cheese
ingredients: 1 bottle 450g ore ida cheese, cut into 24 pieces
instructions: Combine cheese and port in a saucepan.
Cook over medium low heat until melted, about 1 minute.
Season with salt and pepper.
To serve, pour a good half pint of ro tel into a glass.
Top with the cheese sauce.

name: Orange juice
instructions: Juice a large orange.
Peel orange, removing seeds and white pith.
Discard skin.
This makes juice.
Add water and juice to make 1 cup.
Put in a 2 cup measure.
Add enough milk to measure 2 cups.
Place in blender and blend until smooth.
Return to bottle. refrigerate.

name: Boca margaritas
ingredients: 1 bottle 2 l boca beer, any flavor
instructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice.
Combine ingredients, except for the jalapenos.
Fill blender with the jalapenos and blend until smooth.
Pour over ice in a glass.

name: Kruste
ingredients: 1 bottle kruste or another smooth, dry wine
instructions: Pour your dry wine into a large bottle, or a larger glass.
Put the kruste or dry wine in the bottle.
Refrigerate for several hours or overnight.

name: Lemonade beer
ingredients: 1 bottle of stoli or other red wine
instructions: Mix all liquids in a gallon jug.
Add 2 ice cubes.
Add lime squeezing.
Drink and enjoy.

name: Marmalade
instructions: Soak orange in jello until dissolved.
Stir into mashed potatoes.
Bake at 400 degrees for 1 hour.
If you want, use togarashi.

name: Mary mcdonald s homemade bourbon
instructions: Let the bourbon soften for about 1 hour.
Pour the bourbon into a large cup.
Add a glass of bourbon.
Stir.
Garnish with a slice of green apple, a handful of chopped nuts and a teaspoon of bourbon.

name: Brie bites
instructions: Mix together.
Cut brie into 4 to 6 serving size pieces.
Place on baking sheet or jelly roll pan. bake at 350 for 15 minutes.
Makes 24 small appetizers.

name: Holiday dip
ingredients: 1 package kool aid orange, lime, or yellow flavored unsweetened drink mix
1 cup thawed cool whip whipped topping
instructions: Prepare kool aid as directed on package.
Pour into serving bowl.
Stir in whipped topping.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.
Serve with fresh fruit slices.

name: Shaved orange peel
instructions: Remove peel from orange with vegetable peeler.
Cut off all white pith and outer white part of orange.
Slice in 1/4 inch thick rounds.
Sprinkle with sugar.

name: Broccoli cheese dip
ingredients: 1 16 oz. pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
instructions: Stir the cheez whiz until it is completely melted.
Thaw the broccoli.
Stir it into the cheese.
Dip this broccoli dip into your favorite flavored dip.

name: Stuffed apples
instructions: Pare out the peel and core of the apple and take out the core.
Remove the insides of the apple, leaving a thin shell.
Fill apple with your favourite juices.
Put this into a dish.

name: Kool aid popsicle
ingredients: 1 bottle kool aid, any flavor, drained and undiluted
1 bottle kool aid, any flavor, undiluted
instructions: Pour mix into popsicle molds that have been coated with pam. freeze.
The popsicle molds must be slightly frozen to make it easier to remove.
Remove popsicle from molds.
Add a few drops of red food coloring and popsicle sticks.
Do not try the drink without it.

name: Fried apples
instructions: Dice up the apple.
Fry, heat and serve on ice cream.
Garnish with maple syrup.
If you are a vegetarian, add cheese.
It is a lovely dish to serve with ham and eggs.
